Ron,
"Collecting, an Unruly Passion, Psychological  Perspectives" by Werner Muensterberger is an interesting if sometimes slightly uncomfortably accurate read.  (Princeton University Press, 1994.)

Jim




  Looking on-line, I thought there would be more pictures shown. However, it is interesting to note that this collector lectures on "The Phycology of a Collector." (Might try to sit in on one of his lectures sometime, if I can hear about it scheduled somewhere.) He also makes some comments about disposal of one's collection. 

  Ron
  STL
